description:
While heading to her first day of school, Momoka is rescued from a pervert by a girl wielding Desert Eagles. 
After becoming friends with the school`s charismatic Miou, the other students begin harassing Momoka. 
As a member of the Survival Game Club, Momoka prepares for her first battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Intégration - J`ai dit que je m`inscrivais ? Mais c`est faux ! - En fait, je voulais faire un vrai jeu de survie !
Joining the Club! / You Said You`d Join? I Lied! / I Wanted to Play a Realistic Survival Game
Nyuubu! / Nyuubu to Itta na? Are wa Uso Da / Hontou wa Real na Sabage o Yaru Tsumorideshita
入部! / 入部と言ったな? あれは嘘だ / 本当はリアルなサバゲをやるつもりでした
